data.persona: I am a special kind of lizard. I can change colors at will. I am very hard to find because of my camouflage.
data.description:
You are in the Top of a tall tree.
This is the most majestic tree in the jungle. It spans high into the sky, with brilliant emerald leaves and sturdy brown branches. It is very healthy and spreads very wide. It flowers with brilliant violet flowers.
There's two branchs, a monkey, two nests, a treehouse, a bird, and two flowers here.
The bee is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to fool the bee into getting comfortable with me
data.mid_motivation: I want to gobble up the bee once it is off guard
data.long_motivation: I want to be healthy and strong by eating big insects

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go top of the tall tree
